attributes.action: Bring back death penalty for child killers and mass murderers
attributes.additional_details: Harsher punishments are needed - for the worst of crimes, this should mean death.
attributes.background: Bring back capital punishment for people who are convicted of murdering a child, and for people who are convicted of murdering more than person.
